amendment.description: Amendment enables any person who is entitled to retired pay for nonregular (reserve) service or who, but for age, would be so entitled to be honored as a veteran. A person shall not be entitled to any benefit by reason of such recognition.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 114-742 to enable any person who is entitled to retired pay for nonregular (reserve) service or who, but for age, would be so entitled to be honored as a veteran. A person shall not be entitled to any benefit by reason of such recognition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 421 - 1 (Roll no. 515).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 421 - 1 (Roll no. 515).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Takano.
